Hello!
Details: I'm trying to decide if this product is something I want to pursue. I had someone build a site with Wordpress about 2 years ago, and I mostly "maintained" it with small changes here and there, etc. Overall, the experience was very clunky, not fun, and not that good looking either (Elementor was the platform). Change this little setting and it screws up five other things. It was all very annoying and so I switched completely to using Hostinger's website builder. It's amazingly simple and fun to use, but does have a few limitations compared to Wordpress - which they outline on their site.
